mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_share (id, file_id, share_code, password, expire_at, download_limit, download_count, created_by, created_at) VALUES ( CAST(#{id} AS UUID), CAST(#{fileId} AS UUID), #{shareCode}, #{password}, #{expireAt}, #{downloadLimit}, #{downloadCount}, CAST(#{createdBy} AS UUID), #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, file_id, share_code, password, expire_at, download_limit, download_count, created_by, created_at FROM file_share WHERE id = CAST(#{id} AS UUID)
mapper.update: UPDATE file_share SET password = #{password}, expire_at = #{expireAt}, download_limit = #{downloadLimit}, download_count = #{downloadCount} WHERE id = CAST(#{id} AS UUID)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM file_share WHERE id = CAST(#{id} AS UUID)
mapper.select: SELECT id, file_id, share_code, password, expire_at, download_limit, download_count, created_by, created_at FROM file_share WHERE REPLACE(CAST(created_by AS VARCHAR), '-', '') = REPLACE(#{createdBy}, '-', '') ORDER BY created_at DESC
